name: Directed Mana
description: A monster spell.
Spawns a tear in reality, field intensity depends on spell level.
Spawns hemor.
Spawns hemor.
Spawns hemor.

name: Salt and Spirit
description: You call the ashes, and from them come the brood.

name: Salt and Spirit
description: You call the ashes, and from them come the brood.

name: Salt and Spirit
description: You call the ashes, and from them come the brood.

name: Salt and Spirit
description: You call the ashes, and from them come the brood.
Pen at the ready to crush that which isn't part of the blob.

A feral human in torn business attire with an absolutely abhorrent amount of anxiety written across their face. They're slobbering at the mouth to complete some task, though you can see how they never will. They're too busy trying to kill you.

special_attacks.monster_message: All business, the feral forces you out of their way with a blast of pure mana!

special_attacks.description: The busy body launches a sharpened pen that homes in on you!

description: A feral human in torn business attire, or at least it looks that way. Their movements are so fretful it's hard to determine one from the next, and some magic seems to amplifying that effect. You're just another rung in the corporate ladder to someone like this.

special_attacks.monster_message: All business, the feral forces you out of their way with a blast of pure mana!
The feral easily reels you toward it, ready to put a pen in the issue at hand.

special_attacks.description: The workaholic launches a sharpened pen that homes in on you!

name: Summon Sparklet Smoke Mage
description: Summons enemy sparklets.

Fallen prey to the magics they once wielded, this mage is some half-alive thing, animated only by the magic running through them. They seem to lose presence with each moment, less and less behind their eyes.

special_attacks.monster_message: A limb from the mage arcs into a creature of it's own!
The mage calls upon the power of the circle...
The mage blinks and suddenly gets pulled into itself, teleporting away.

description: There is nothing here but remains.

special_attacks.monster_message: A limb from the mage arcs into a creature of it's own!
The mage calls upon the power of the circle...
The mage blinks and suddenly gets pulled into itself, teleporting away.

description: Fallen prey to the magics they once wielded, this mage is some half-alive thing, animated only by the magic running through them. Flame and destruction is all they or their body know.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mage pushes you back with raw mana!
The mage calls upon the power of the circle...
The mage blinks and suddenly gets pulled into itself, teleporting away.
The mage throws both hands to the sky and calls down firey hell.

description: Humanity despicably burns very bright in this individual's flaming eyes.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mage pushes you back with raw mana!
The mage calls upon the power of the circle...
The mage blinks and suddenly gets pulled into itself, teleporting away.
The mage throws both hands to the sky and calls down firey hell.

name: Coldlight Flashbang
description: Causes a freezing flashbang at the target. Due to budget constraints, operators will have to pay for the spell out of their own pocket.
message: A freezing light floods the area.

description: This armored soldier appears to have been some sort of special forces agent, and a magical one at that. They spark with magic energy, and an MP5SD is slung across their chest.

special_attacks.monster_message: The operator weaves and dives through a portal.
The operator throws a flashbang!

special_attacks.description: The operator weaves in a shot with their point-slung smg.

description: This armored soldier appears to have been some sort of special forces agent, and a magical one at that. They spark with magic energy, and an MP5SD is slung across their chest.

special_attacks.monster_message: The operator weaves and dives through a portal.
The operator throws a flashbang!

special_attacks.description: The operator weaves in a 3-round burst with their point-slung smg.

description: Fallen prey to the magics they once wielded, this mage is some half-alive thing, animated only by the magic running through them. Gore drips from their body, all flesh slowly falling away, except their eyes. Pain is reflected deeply in their sunken, untouched eyes.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mage forces you back with raw mana!
The mage calls upon the power of the circle...
The mage reaches out his hand and a torrent of ice flies outward!

description: A mage that has paid the ultimate price. Their body writhes, a living nest for creatures of swarming intelligence. Pure agony is painted on what remains of this person's face.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mage forces you back with raw mana!
The mage calls upon the power of the circle...
The mage reaches out his hand and a torrent of ice flies outward!

description: Fallen prey to the magics they once wielded, this mage is some half-alive thing, animated only by the magic running through them. Bloated terribly with drained, stretched skin and wandering about in retching agony. Still, the yearn for power drives them to live and to kill.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mage pushes you back with raw mana!
The mage calls upon the power of the circle...
The mage blinks and suddenly gets pulled into itself, teleporting away.

description: Much like a giant infant, this thing pukes, shits, cries and giggles as it meanders around in abhorrent glee.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mage pushes you back with raw mana!
The mage calls upon the power of the circle...
The mage blinks and suddenly gets pulled into itself, teleporting away.

description: A dastardly little thing, hunched with a gleam in it's eye. The infamous goblin summoner, source of the goblin's real power.

special_attacks.monster_message: The summoner reaches an outstretched hand and creates bees, imploring them to fly at their enemies.
The summoner pitches a cloud of dust, new goblins forming from it mid-air..

description: A dastardly little thing, hunched with a gleam in it's eye. The infamous goblin summoner, source of the goblin's real power.

special_attacks.monster_message: The summoner reaches an outstretched hand and creates bees, imploring them to fly at their enemies.
The summoner produces a small trinket and crushes it, keenly teleporting.
The summoner pitches a cloud of dust, new goblins forming from it mid-air.

name: Summon Goblins
description: Survival not guaranteed.

name: Summon Goblins
description: Survival not guaranteed.

name: Summon Goblins
description: Survival not guaranteed.

name: Hemor Deathburst
description: Survival not guaranteed.

name: Winter Wolf's Call
description: Summon your personal pack of winter wolves to freeze and maul your foes.
An orc loose metal plate that is continuously chanting in a foul language, seemingly encouraging the rest of the tribe into a blood rage.

special_attacks.monster_message: The chanter bellows and howls, the other orcs filling with battle fervor.
The chanter hums a low tone, seeming to push wounded nearby orcs into a painless fury.

description: An orc in loose metal plate that is continuously chanting in a foul language, seemingly encouraging the rest of the tribe into a blood rage.

special_attacks.monster_message: The chanter bellows and howls, the other orcs filling with battle fervor.
The chanter hums a low tone, seeming to push wounded orcs into a painless fury.

description: This is going to be extremely painful... for you.

A glowing gout of light, bedangled and bedazzled by jewels forms a second sun in the sky. Kelkemmemnon, Destroyer of Xentor Jerlith, First Jewel and Progenitor of Flame stands before you! Best spend your mana wisely.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mage pushes you back with raw mana!
The archmagus disappears in a torrent of flame and reappears elsewhere.
The mage throws both hands to the sky and calls down firey hell.

name: Artillery
description: You locate and destroy a target area.

A hair on the back of your neck, a face only seen in shadow and what a black cat's path have in common. Azarkan, Absorber of the Astral Phylactery, Head Ritualist and Manipulator of Shadow stands before you! Best spend your mana wisely.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mage forces you back with raw mana!
The mage reaches out his hand and a torrent of ice flies outward!
A visage even unseen can be unsettling.

name: Azarkan Prank
description: Pranks the PC.  Gag humor.
Spawns necromancers.
Spawns necromancers.
Spawns necromancers.

name: Skin and Bones: Revival
description: The Bones Strike Back

name: Skin and Bones: Revival: Revival
description: The Bones Strike Back

name: Skin and Bones: Revival
description: The Bones Strike Back

name: Skin and Bones: Revival: Revival
description: The Bones Strike Back

One of three scouting eyes of the Devil, as close to he as any mortal shall ever come. Such a shattering of ego has taken it's own twisted form, guarding with all the armies of hell the unholy brazier from which it's body of flame grows, soon to become a Devil of it's own.

special_attacks.monster_message: You hear shrieking as the heart atop the tower glows and the armies of hell pour forth.

description: One of three scouting eyes of the Devil, as close to he as any mortal shall ever come. Such a shattering of ego has taken it's own form, this spiteful creature, torn from Mother's breast.

special_attacks.monster_message: The creature devilishly whines and dark powers respond.

description: Wearing a tactical camo ghillie suit with Kevlar lining, this person seems to be a hired gun turned feral. Their calm, collected eyes scan for threats as their hands work a deadly .50 caliber bolt action rifle. Looks like you pissed somebody off...
